string.text: Sardines
Very tasty fish! It was caught in the Pacific Ocean, cooked with fine oil, and transported into the Zone by some dealers. Shelf life is 1.5 months.
Tin of nuts
Nuts have a high amount of vitamins and carbohydrates. Eating a tin of nuts is an effective way to stave of hunger and it also restores some energy.
"Wild" drink
The drink is called "Wild" because it contains 5% alcohol and some drugs that cause an adrenaline boost in the bloodstream.
Olives
Tins of fresh olives are a rare sight in the Zone. A popular and highly tradable item for stalkers, but also spoils quickly. It has a slight radiation reducing effect.
Processed cheese
Ordinary processed cheese from the local underground factory. Despite the fact that it is made in the Zone, no one has yet been poisoned.
Dry biscuits
Quite a nutritious product, good for long storage, but it is not a meal on its own.
Chocolate
The favorite treat of many stalkers. An excellent remedy for a bad mood.
Chocolate bar
Delicious milk chocolate bar with cream filling. An excellent remedy for a bad mood as treats in the zone are few and far between.
Beer
Good drink, It cheers you up but that's about it. It does reduce the radiation in the body but you will need to drink lots and you'll have to get very drunk before it has any real effect.
Orange juice
Nutritious drink with plenty of Vitamin C, excellent for restoring health.
Beef-Jerky

Strips of your favorite Beef-jerky. Perfectly seasoned and moist with a salty fat that keeps you chewing for hours. This particular batch was harvested from the best meat in the Zone, the side-effects of which are slightly better than your typical Zone fare.
Chips
Light potato chips. A good source of salt and preservatives is always a useful thing in the Zone.
Hash Cookies
Looking for that little extra boost and head-fuzzing-goodness? BOING! Eat a handfull of these and you'll find that night's aren't as dark and getting shot actually tickles a little.
Cocoa-Puffed Crunchy-Block
These formed-marshmellow crispy-chunks made are sticky and full of sugar. The perfect get up and go breakfast in the Zone. YUM!
